channel.title: Windows on READ FROM LIFE
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on READ FROM LIFE

item.title: Windows.Service
item.description: [TOC] Windows 程序服务化 参考 SC NSSM windows service startup timeout reset service timeout 服务安装启动报错误1053 SC - Service Controller 语法 sc [ServerName] [command] [Optionname= Optionvalues] 常用参数 config 更新服务配置 sc config nsqd start= auto control 发送控制指令 sc [<ServerName>] control [<ServiceName>] [{paramchange | netbindadd | netbindremove | netbindenable | netbinddisable | <UserDefinedControlB>}] create | delete 创建|删除服务 sc create nsqd binPath= .\nsqd.exe start= auto start | stop 启动|停止服务 sc start nsqd 示例 @echo off sc create nsqd binPath= .
